Class AwtConsole.LineInputStream

java.lang.Object
  |

        |
        +--java.io.FilterInputStream
              |
              +--FESI.awtgui.AwtConsole.LineInputStream
public class AwtConsole.LineInputStream
extends java.io.FilterInputStream

FilterInputStream that buffers input until newline occurs. Then everything is passed along. If backspace (ch = 8) is received then the last character in the buffer is removed.
